Posts.Content: mywifemylife wrote: Hi,   My wife just got diagnosed with breast cancer (Ductal Infiltrating Canciroma). Could you please recommend the best hospital/medical center for treatment in the US?  Really appreciate it.   p.s. I'm not a US citizen but willing to travel anywhere to get her treated.   Log in to post a reply
